name: Coupons by Role
author: Petri Rahikkala

sections.description: Coupons by Role plugin allows administrators to hide coupon field and button from the Woocommerce cart page for each group/role and optionally show text instead. This plugin is useful when you use role based pricing plugins since they do not discount prices with woocommerce functions and in those cases Woocommerce allows double discount where role based price and coupon can be stacked.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The plugin settings can be accessed via the ‘Woocommerce’, ‘Settings’ menu and “Coupons by Role” tab in the administration area (either your site administration for single-site installs, or your network administration for network installs).

short_description: Allows administrators to globally hide Woocommerce coupon field from the cart page for each role and show optional message instead.
description: Coupons by Role plugin allows administrators to hide coupon field and button from the Woocommerce cart page for each group/role and optionally show text instead. This plugin is useful when you use role based pricing plugins since they do not discount prices with woocommerce functions and in those cases Woocommerce allows double discount where role based price and coupon can be stacked.
